item.title: Protection against multi-modal attacks with Microsoft Defender
item.description: Multi-modal (or hybrid) attacks are increasingly used by threat actors to orchestrate multi-phase campaigns. In Part 1 of our blog series, we explored how attackers use email bombing as a distraction technique to overwhelm users and bypass security controls. Today, we’re expanding that conversation to showcase how Microsoft Defender can detect and correlate certain hybrid, multi-modal attacks that span across email, Teams, identity, and endpoint vectors; and how these insights surface in the Microsoft Defender portal.
